Description: Available 9/1 - Welcome home to this Marlborough St. one bedroom home. Parlor level, South facing, with high ceilings, hardwood floors, and exposed brick. Open concept kitchen with breakfast bar, gas cooking, and dishwasher. Common laundry in the building, Hynes "T" stop less than 2 block away. Photos from previous tenant. One month broker fee to be paid by incoming tenant.
